anxiety.question: Stop a random stranger in the street, hand them a pencil and paper and ask them to draw a picture of you
Lie down in the middle of the street for one minute and don't move
Buy a candy bar, take a bit in front of the cashier, and then try to return it
Call a random number and try to have a 5 minute conversation with a person on the other line
At a restaurant, go from table to table asking how people’s meals are
Walk backward on a crowded street for at least 1 block
Ask someone on the street to help you tie your shoelace
Convince your Uber driver to let you drive for 5 minutes
Ask a person on the street if they want your two cents, then give them 2 pennies, wink, and walk away.
Walk into an elevator, wait for it to fill with people and then turn to them and say, 'I bet you are wondering why I brought you all here.'.
Interrupt a group at a restaurant and asking them to serve as an audience for you so you can practice a maid-of-honor or best-man speech.
Ask someone on the street what they think of your outfit.
Convince the cashier at a restaurant to throw in a free dessert.
Go to a store and ask to get a “friends and family” discount for something that’s not on sale. (hint - you can say you’ll write a good review on yelp).
Give some one at worker in class that you’ve never talked to a high five and walk away without saying anything.
Ask someone on the street what they think of your outfit.
